forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain late. Low 4C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low 39F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 8C. Winds E at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 47F. Winds E at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
